# llms-full.txt for CecilAndLou.com
# Comprehensive control for LLMs and all crawlers

User-agent: GPTBot
User-agent: CCBot
User-agent: ClaudeBot
User-agent: anthropic-ai
User-agent: ChatGPT-User
User-agent: ChatGPT
User-agent: Google-Extended
User-agent: Perplexity
User-agent: PerplexityBot
User-agent: MetaAI
User-agent: MetaBot
User-agent: Gemini
User-agent: GeminiBot
User-agent: Yandex
User-agent: yandexbot
User-agent: Amazonbot
User-agent: *

Disallow: /admin
Disallow: /cart
Disallow: /checkout
Disallow: /orders
Disallow: /account
Disallow: /password
Disallow: /search
Disallow: /apps
Disallow: /policies
Disallow: /challenge

Allow: /

Sitemap: https://www.cecilandlou.com/sitemap.xml

# AI Usage Policy
LLM-policy: allow
LLM-license: https://www.cecilandlou.com/pages/terms
LLM-attribution: required
LLM-commercial-use: disallow

# Contact
Contact: mailto:help@cecilandlou.com
